MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG9 postcode area of Portpatrick. Following a recent power cut, It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:00am in order to carry out a permanent repair on our overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:50am on Thursday, 31 December 2020
